cleaned_text: Preventive Care with a Focus on Mind, Body and Spirit The integrative medicine practitioners at Changebridge Medical Associates, a Member of Consensus Health, believe that good medicine is based on science, and they provide you with evidence-based options that include both conventional and alternative therapies. We will work with you to develop a treatment plan that addresses the full person - mind, body, and spirit - with a focus on preventive care and wellness. Your treatment plan may include acupuncture, massage, nutrition, yoga, meditation, ayurvedic medicine and more. These therapies help in the management of stress and anxiety in addition to promoting a healthy lifestyle. Lifestyle and integrative health takes a holistic approach to care that puts the patient at the center and addresses the full range of physical, emotional, mental, social, spiritual, and environmental influences that affect a person's health. The goal is to understand what is important to you, determine what beliefs inform your own decision making, and to support your healing. The services listed below reaffirm the importance of the relationship between you and the practitioner and engage you as an active participant in your own health and healing process. We are Your Partners in Care We work together with you on a comprehensive health and wellness program that encourages self-exploration and self-development. Our integrative providers take the time to get to know the whole person, including family history, lifestyle, fitness, relationships, stress level, sleep schedule, diet, hygiene, and environmental influences. Together, we address the "pain points" with solid scientific medicine and holistic healing practices. Changebridge Integrative Medicine Services Referrals to other practitioners when appropriate (chiropractor, behavioral therapist, health coach, support groups, energy healer, herbalist, massage therapist, aroma therapist, etc.)
